publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3960 Bill Butler: 40th Birthday of Scottish Marriage Care—That the Parliament congratulates Scottish Marriage Care on its 40th anniversary celebration being held on 23 February 2006; applauds the hard work of all its dedicated volunteers and staff; recognises that Scottish Marriage Care is a family support charity specialising in relationship counselling and early intervention for people of all ages and stages in their relationship; acknowledges that Scottish Marriage Care’s services are for everyone without exception including those who are married, living together, in a committed relationship, single, divorced or separated; welcomes the recent initiatives to promote preventative work by targeting services at young people, and recommends that people in a troubled relationship consider seeking help at an early stage as research and practice show that trained counsellors can benefit individuals, couples and families. Supported by: Dr Elaine Murray*, Robin Harper*, Pauline McNeill*, Chris Ballance*, Michael McMahon*, Shiona Baird*, Mr David Davidson*, Marlyn Glen*, Jackie Baillie*, Mr Jim Wallace*, Stewart Stevenson*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Patrick Harvie*
S2M-3960 40th Birthday of Scottish Marriage Care (lodged on 15 February 2006) Murray Tosh*, Cathie Craigie*, Fiona Hyslop*, Brian Adam*
S2M-3960 40th Birthday of Scottish Marriage Care (lodged on 15 February 2006) Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Phil Gallie*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*
S2M-3960 40th Birthday of Scottish Marriage Care (lodged on 15 February 2006) Frances Curran*, Eleanor Scott*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-3960 40th Birthday of Scottish Marriage Care (lodged on 15 February 2006) Donald Gorrie*, Elaine Smith*
S2M-3960 40th Birthday of Scottish Marriage Care (lodged on 15 February 2006) Maureen Macmillan*
S2M-3960 40th Birthday of Scottish Marriage Care (lodged on 15 February 2006) John Home Robertson*
S2M-3960 40th Birthday of Scottish Marriage Care (lodged on 15 February 2006) Irene Oldfather*
S2M-3960 40th Birthday of Scottish Marriage Care (lodged on 15 February 2006) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
